def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a + b)


main()


def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a + b)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

a = int(input())

def main():
    a = int(input())
    print(a * (a + 1) // 2)

main()
